game.name: Animals Memory: Monkeys
game.shortDescription: Is a card game with images of various monkeys that will test your memory. The goal of the game is to find paired cards
game.shortDescriptionEn: Is a card game with images of various monkeys that will test your memory. The goal of the game is to find paired cards

reviewHighlights.text: This game is the best! I love these memory games. Also with monkeys like omg. I really recommend this game to people who like monkeys and memory games...
This is a really fun and easy memory game. You need to complete levels for 51 achievements. I complete all 18 puzzles and then repeat the first puzzle...
